html: I’m a fairly liberal person. I like people to get along and be nice to each other no matter of age, race or gender. We’re all just people trying to have a decent life. But these flying ants are annoying as fuck and can piss off out of my back yard!
text:
I’m a fairly liberal person. I like people to get along and be nice to each other no matter of age, race or gender. We’re all just people trying to have a decent life.

But these flying ants are annoying as fuck and can piss off out of my back yard!
